name: BigBen
0:
”Alexa, open Big Ben”
”Alexa, play Big Ben”
”Alexa, ask Big Ben for help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big ben
des:
Immerse yourself in the iconic sounds of the famous London bell tower, all from the comfort of your home. With the Alexa Skill 'Big Ben', you'll experience the authentic chimes of the 'Great Bell', which has been marking time over London for over a century. Enjoy an auditory journey to the heart of London.

Listen to the majestic strikes of the Great Bell and learn about the compelling history of this bell upon request—from its initial casting in 1856 to the challenges that made it legendary.

Activate the skill with simple voice commands like 'Alexa, open Big Ben' or 'Alexa, play Big Ben'. Once activated, Alexa will play the current chime of Big Ben.

The 'Big Ben' skill is perfect for anyone interested in history, loves London, or appreciates cultural insights. It offers a fascinating experience to anyone seeking unique auditory experiences or wishing to connect with British culture and history.

Let the sounds of Big Ben fill your home with London's history and culture through Alexa. It's as if the bell tower stands right in your living room.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
